name: Dubai Miracle Garden
description: {'Location:': ['Located in the Dubai Land area, about 15 minutes from the Mall of the Emirates.'], 'Key Features:': ["The world's largest natural flower garden, containing more than 150 million flowers.", 'Unique floral designs featuring airplane models, houses, and famous figures.', 'Walkways through flowers and areas for sitting and relaxing.'], 'Tips for visiting:': ['Visit it in the early morning or late afternoon to avoid the heat of the sun.', 'Wear comfortable shoes because the tour involves a lot of walking.', 'It is best to visit between November and April, when the park is open during the winter season.']}
short_description: Dubai Miracle Garden, the world's largest natural flower garden, features amazing floral designs and stunning sculptures.

name: Al Fahidi Historical Neighbourhood
description: {'Location:': ['The Al Fahidi Historical Neighbourhood is located in Bur Dubai, near Dubai Creek, and is one of the oldest heritage sites in the city.'], 'Key Features:': ['Traditional buildings in an old Emirati architectural style with the famous wind towers (Barajeel).', 'Museums and art galleries, such as the Dubai Museum and the Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Centre for Cultural Understanding.', 'Narrow alleys and traditional markets reflect the old life in Dubai.', 'Heritage cafes serving Emirati cuisine.'], 'Tips for visiting:': ['The neighborhood button in the morning or before sunset to enjoy the calm atmosphere and take pictures.', 'Wear comfortable clothes when wandering in the tight alleys.', 'Do not miss the experience of Arabic coffee in traditional cafes.', 'A visit to the neighborhood can be combined with a lesson across Dubai Creek.']}
short_description: Al Fahidi Historical Neighbourhood showcases Dubai's heritage with traditional buildings and cultural museums.

short_description: A 4-star hotel with modern amenities, dining options, and a convenient location.

name: Global Village
description: {'Location:': ['Global Village is located on Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, Exit 37, in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.'], 'Key Features:': ['A global cultural experience: bringing together cultures from over 90 countries through pavilions showcasing their traditional products.', 'Entertainment shows: Concerts, dance performances, and plays from around the world.', 'Amusement and Adventures: The "Carnival" zone featuring exciting games and entertainment experiences for families.', 'Restaurants and food stalls: A wide selection of international foods from various cuisines.', 'Unique shopping: handcrafted and traditional products from various countries at affordable prices.'], 'working hours:': ['Sunday to Wednesday: from 4:00 pm until 12:00 midnight', 'Thursday to Saturday: from 4:00 pm until 1:00 am', '(Working hours may vary during official holidays and private seasons)'], 'Tips for visiting:': ['Make sure to arrive early to avoid the crowds on weekends.', 'Wear comfortable shoes because the place is vast and requires a lot of walking.', 'Make sure to check the live shows and events schedule before your visit.']}
short_description: Global Village is a leisure and cultural destination that offers global shows, shopping, and diverse dining experiences.

name: The Dubai Fountain
description: {'Information:': ['Located next to Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall in Downtown Dubai, United Arab Emirates.'], 'Key Features:': ["The world's tallest and largest dancing fountain.", 'Daily water shows synchronized with music and lighting.', 'The water level reaches 150 meters.', 'Advanced lighting systems with over 6,000 lamps and 25 color projectors.'], 'Tips for visiting:': ['Best viewing times: after sunset when the shows light up and become more spectacular.', 'Book a traditional boat (abra) tour to see the shows up close.', 'Try to arrive early to secure a good spot, especially on weekends.', 'The shows are free, but boats or nearby platforms may require a paid reservation.']}
short_description: The Dubai Fountain offers spectacular water, light, and music shows near the Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall.

name: Burj Al Arab
description: {'Location:': ['The Burj Al Arab is located on its own artificial island 280 meters off Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.'], 'Facilities and Services:': ['Award-winning fine dining restaurants, such as Al Muntaha and Al Mahara.', 'Luxurious Talise Spa with therapeutic sessions and panoramic views.', 'Indoor and outdoor pool, and private beach.', 'Helicopter landing pad.', 'Luxury car service (Rolls Royce and Lamborghini).', 'Kids club and babysitting services.', 'Private reception and 24-hour concierge service.'], 'Rooms:': ['All accommodations are luxury duplex suites with spaces starting from 170 square meters.', 'The suites are equipped with 24-hour butler service.', 'Luxurious interior design with gold and marble, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the Arabian Gulf.', 'The suites include spacious living areas, private offices, and a jacuzzi in each suite.'], 'Nearby tourist attractions:': ['Souk Madinat Jumeirah (5-minute drive): A shopping and dining complex with views of the waterways.', 'Wild Wadi Water Park (next to the hotel): A water city full of water games and adventures.', 'Mall of the Emirates (10 minutes): Contains Ski Dubai and many international stores.', 'Palm Jumeirah (15 minutes): A tourist destination featuring luxury hotels and resorts.', 'Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall (20 minutes): The tallest tower in the world and the most famous shopping and entertainment center.']}
short_description: Burj Al Arab is a luxurious 7-star hotel in Dubai, famous for its sail-shaped design and exclusive services.
